page.title: 12Employment in Priors Marston
page.content:
{ Employment Commuting Full-time 180 Banbury 20 Part-time 42 Leam./Warwick 30 Women full-time 36 Coventry/Nun. 21 Women part-time 38 Rugby 8 self-employed 60 Daventry 19 Housewives 91 Southam 9 Working for YOP 1 Priors Marstn 54 Regst.unemployed 7
Most people have the use of a{car. Midland Red{Bus}to Leamington, school term only, leaves 7.45am, returns 5pm.
{Occupations}in Priors Marston include; Farmer Shopkeeper Antique dealer Postman Paper man Design engineer Milkman Carpenter School caretaker Builder Dressmaker Domestic help Plumber Illustrator Garage mechanic Vicar Upholsterer Agric. contractr Publican Gardener Riding instructor
